title: Mystery of the Egyptian Scroll
description: Think HARDY BOYS meets ANCIENT EGYPT, and you have an idea of what's inside.12-year-old Zet is in charge of his father’s pottery stall, now that his father has gone to fight the Hyksos. One day, a thief runs through the marketplace with guards in hot pursuit. But the man gets away. Zet learns there’s a reward for capturing the thief and turning him in. What better way to make a few extra copper deben? His sister, 10-year-old Kat, thinks he’s crazy. He’s determined to win the reward. Little does he know that danger, intrigue and heart-stopping action lie ahead! (from youngedition.pixelofink.com)
author: Scott  Peters
